articles.author: Bryan Murphy
articles.title: San Francisco Giants’ big money players deliver 3-1 win against Milwaukee Brewers - McCovey Chronicles
articles.description: The San Francisco Giants spent the offseason building a very specific dollhouse, and it was nice to see everyone finally play their parts.
articles.content: Its not always the case that the team you design winds up being the team you have. Theres always some combination of injury or ineffectiveness rarely does a team meet the full measure of its expected… [+5273 chars]
